title: CRETING PBE ACCOUNT ERROR
body: So today i found out i got accepted for the PBE. but when i tried to create my account i kept getting this notification saying: The server is currently busy, Try again later... Is there a way to solve this?

replies.body: There may be a browser setting or issue that's causing you to receive an error when accessing the pbe account page.  As a first step, clean your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to refresh your browser settings.  Afterwards, login from your specific region's homepage and access the PBE signup page from there.  It should take you to the final step, which is account creation.  You can additionally try as Incognito Mode if you use Chrome.  Hope that helps!

Hey Porocles, so i tried it and i went into the EUNE pbe register, but it keeps doing the same thing, by saying the server is busy. Maybe it can be caused by this: Under my profile, it says "North America" But everytime i change it to EUNE it refreshes the page and then i cant find the PBE again
Thanks for the update.  What is the url/link of the page you are trying to visit?
When i enter that link, it says " North America " At the top under the login/profile and i thought if i change it to EUNE it will maybe fix it... but when i do it truns away from the site

No worries, let's start it up from the beginning.  First go to the[ EUNE main site](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/).  It's important that you're logging into the correct server page.

After logging in, try this new link to[ access the PBE page](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  It looks like the one being used before was not it!

That should get you fixed up!
I was just looking on the servers for the PBE and i got a little worried, when i saw that EUNE wasn't english. Can i only log onto EUNE. because i dont understand the languenge they speak in EUNE PBE
